snippet: After years in baseball’s doldrums the Orioles are in contention in the American League East, taking their veteran TV broadcaster Gary Thorne along for the wild ride.
lead_paragraph: After years in baseball’s doldrums the Orioles are in contention in the American League East, taking their veteran TV broadcaster Gary Thorne along for the wild ride.

headline.seo: Orioles Have New York Connection: In Dugout and Broadcast Booth
